Welcome to my personal website! If you would like some to hire me for programming, web development, or web design don't hesitate to email me.

About

I live in Manhattan, KS with my wonderful fiancé Katie Phillips and work full-time as a Java web developer for ACEware Systems.

I graduated from Kansas State University with a bachelor's degree in Information Systems and a minor in Business.

I enjoy both client and server side technologies and strive to build usable, clean, and functional websites.
